sources: W.D. Wash. LCR 7 (word limits effective Jan 13, 2026)

caption.courtNameFormat: IN THE SUPERIOR COURT OF THE STATE OF WASHINGTON IN AND FOR THE COUNTY OF {COUNTY}

jurat.language: I, {NAME}, declare under penalty of perjury under the laws of the State of Washington that the foregoing is true and correct. Executed on {DATE} at {CITY}, Washington.
jurat.federalOverride: I declare under penalty of perjury that the foregoing is true and correct. Executed on {DATE}.

specialRules.note: Documents must not contain colored markings — all text and graphics must be black and white

implementationNotes: Washington has a 3-inch first page top margin for court clerk use
GR 14(a) PROHIBITS colored markings — all documents must be black and white only
W.D. Wash. switched from page limits to word limits effective January 13, 2026
Cause No. is the standard case label (not Case No.)
